name: Stick Around
description:
Keyboard controls:


Player 1:

Movement: Left arrow / Right arrow

Jump: Right shift

Action button: - (dash)

Player 2
Movement: A / D

Jump: Space

Action button: E

Made in 48hrs for #NGJ15 by:

Oliver Pedersen
Oskar Veileborg
Stefan Fredriksen
Josephine Søgaard Andersen
Leo Toivio
Nicholas Bukdahl
